column2: OUR COMMITMENT TO PROTECTING YOUR PRIVACY Community Coffee Company respects your right to privacy and is committed to protecting it.
Community Coffee Company respects your right to privacy and is committed to protecting it.
This server encrypts all information you input before it is sent.
Once your personal information is received, we protect it against unauthorized use.

THE PROTECTION OF YOUR PERSONAL ACCOUNT INFORMATION When you place an order on our site, it is placed through a secure server. This server encrypts all information you input before it is sent. Once your personal information is received, we protect it against unauthorized use.
